objectives.title: AIM/OBJECTIVE
objectives.descset_1: To provide people with hassle free complete home solutions.
objectives.descset_2: People often strive a lot to even achieve the necessary basic services like home cook, home cleaner, car cleaner etc, needed on a daily basis. Our system relieves the people of the tiring efforts to look for these services.

problem_statement.title: PROBLEM STATEMENT
problem_statement.descset_1: Even after putting intense efforts and investing a considerable amount of money to get the necessary services, they do not get the desired solutions. They are quite often unhappy/unsatisfied with the current services they receive.
problem_statement.descset_2: There are societies/areas which are often deprived of the daily essential services due to the geographic conditions (societies that are present on the outskirts of the cities).
